title: Kaushiki
overview: Why is Kaushiki accusing her new friends of her murder in this? This online Hindi web series on Viu showcases how the authorities get to the bottom of things? Or will the dark secrets plaguing Kaushiki and her friends change their lives forever? The web series Kaushiki makes a mark among Hindi thriller shows with its gripping exploration into what makes people corrupt, wicked, and rotten to the core. Watch Sayani Gupta's gripping performance as Kaushiki, the exploration of her relationship with her friends and the aura of mystery that troubles them all. Raising the bar of Hindi thriller shows, Kaushiki explores the lives of these characters in an unpredictable setting that will keep you guessing. Suparn Verma, who has some successful thrillers in his kitty, is the director of this edge-of-the-seat web series.
